output.conclusion: This course provides a solid foundation in engineering drawing, equipping you with the skills to interpret and create technical drawings effectively. Continued practice and exploration of advanced topics will further enhance your expertise.
output.introduction: Welcome to Engineering Drawing! This intermediate-level course builds upon basic drafting principles, focusing on advanced techniques and industry standards. You will learn to create detailed and accurate technical drawings essential for engineering communication.

chapters.description: A quick recap of orthographic projection principles, including multi-view drawings and their importance in representing 3D objects in 2D.
Introduction to sectional views, explaining the purpose of cutting planes and how they reveal internal features of an object.
Exploration of different types of sectional views, such as full sections, half sections, offset sections, and broken-out sections.

modules.moduleTitle: Advanced Orthographic Projections and Sectional Views

chapters.description: Understanding the need for auxiliary views to represent inclined surfaces accurately and without distortion.
Creating primary auxiliary views to show the true shape and size of a single inclined surface.
Introduction to secondary auxiliary views for representing objects with multiple inclined surfaces.
Exploring advanced dimensioning techniques, including chain dimensioning, baseline dimensioning, and coordinate dimensioning.
Introduction to tolerancing, explaining the need for specifying acceptable variations in dimensions.
A brief overview of GD&T principles and its advantages over traditional tolerancing methods.
Identifying different types of fasteners (bolts, screws, rivets) and their standard representation in engineering drawings.
Understanding the principles of creating assembly drawings, including bill of materials (BOM) and exploded views.
A brief introduction to Computer-Aided Design (CAD) software and its role in modern engineering drawing practices.

modules.moduleTitle: Fasteners, Assembly Drawings, and CAD Introduction
